attributes.action: Fathers isolated from children as punishment
attributes.additional_details: This is because such an abusive and controlling behaviour has led and continues to lead to traumatic events, create unbalanced children, perpetuates unbalance in power, causes harm damage scar in men, social injustice, loss of life, loss of trust in the system, limit freedom and liberty of a human being for fear of emotional torture after divorce, law cannot challenge abusing mothers, law cannot establish a balance of rights of fathers, damaging in all ways
attributes.background: Government creates a law to forbid abuse of power and control over minors by forbidding isolation of fathers and children after or during divorce as punishment and manipulation that affects children for life and abused men emotionally and psychologically

rejection.details:
